summary: A Retex of the Sword of Aeons Texture by BurntBiscuit.
descriptionHtml:
A Retex of the Sword of Aeons Texture by BurntBiscuit.  I do have permission to redistribute this modified file, and I give him full credit for the original texture.  All I did was recolor it a bit.

Daedric Sword ID (Daedric is now the sword of Aeons): player.additem 000139b9 1   

Original File here: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1503

===INSTALLATION===
Extract the folder into your Skyrim directory. (C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\)
***NOTE*** If you are not using steam, you may have to open the launcher, go to data files, and tick \"Load Loose Files\" 

===UNINSTALL===
To uninstall, Go to C:\\Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\weapons and delete the steel folder.

=== CHANGE LOG === 

V1.0 - initial release 

v1.1 - Deadric Mesh is now that of the steel sword, and the steel sword mesh is that of the iron sword.  (NPC\'s will now have a regular iron sword, while you will have the Sword of Aeons Retex.)
author: BurntBiscuit and n1kko
